sdk.entities.function.entity#

Function module.

class sdk.entities.function.entity.Function(project: str, name: str, kind: str | None = None, metadata: Metadata | None = None, spec: FunctionSpec | None = None, status: Status | None = None, local: bool = False, embedded: bool = True, uuid: str | None = None)#

Bases: Entity

A class representing a function.

Attributes:
local

Get local flag.

Methods

export([filename])

Export object as a YAML file.

from_dict(obj)

Create object instance from a dictionary.

run([action, inputs, outputs, parameters, ...])

Run function.

save([uuid])

Save function into backend.

to_dict([include_all_non_private])

Return object as dict with all keys.

to_dict_essential()

Return object as dict with some attributes.

Update task.

Save function into backend.

Returns:

Mapping representation of Function from backend.

Export object as a YAML file.

Parameters:

Name of the export YAML file. If not specified, the default value is used.

Returns:
None
run(action: str | None = None, inputs: dict | None = None, outputs: list | None = None, parameters: dict | None = None, local_execution: bool = False, resources: dict | None = None) → Run#

Parameters:

Action to execute.

Function outputs. Used in Run.

Function parameters. Used in Run.

Flag to determine if object has local execution.

K8s resource. Used in Task.

sdk.entities.function.entity.function_from_parameters(project: str, name: str, description: str = '', kind: str | None = None, source: str | None = None, image: str | None = None, tag: str | None = None, handler: str | None = None, command: str | None = None, requirements: list | None = None, sql: str | None = None, local: bool = False, embedded: bool = True, uuid: str | None = None, **kwargs) → Function#

Create function.

Parameters:
projectstr

Name of the project.

namestr

Identifier of the Function.

descriptionstr

Description of the Function.

kindstr, default “job”

The type of the Function.

sourcestr

Path to the Function’s source code on the local file system.

imagestr

Name of the Function’s container image.

tagstr

Tag of the Function’s container image.

handlerstr

Function handler name.

commandstr

Command to run inside the container.

requirementslist

List of requirements for the Function.

sqlstr

SQL query.

localbool

Flag to determine if object will be exported to backend.

embeddedbool

Flag to determine if object must be embedded in project.

uuidstr

UUID.

**kwargs

Keyword arguments.

Returns:
Function

Function object.
